languages.text: "От губернатора Вьятт! Здесь все знают, что она творит с нами. Мы долго терпели, надеялись, что кто-нибудь вмешается, поможет... Так и не дождались... "

traits.locale_text: "От губернатора Вьятт! Здесь все знают, что она творит с нами. Мы долго терпели, надеялись, что кто-нибудь вмешается, поможет... Так и не дождались... "

languages.text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."
languages.original_text: "От губернатора Вьятт! Здесь все знают, что она творит с нами. Мы долго терпели, надеялись, что кто-нибудь вмешается, поможет... Так и не дождались... "

traits.locale_text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."
"From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."
"From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."
"From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."

languages.text: 「ビャット総督からです！ここにいる誰もが、総督が僕らにしている仕打ちを知ってます。長い間耐えてきました、誰かが介入して助けてくれると…。でも、これまでにそんな人はいませんでした…」
languages.original_text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."

traits.locale_text: 「ビャット総督からです！ここにいる誰もが、総督が僕らにしている仕打ちを知ってます。長い間耐えてきました、誰かが介入して助けてくれると…。でも、これまでにそんな人はいませんでした…」

languages.text: “是维亚特总督在残害我们！这里的每个人都知道她对我们做了什么。我们已经忍了很久了，希望有谁能帮帮我们……但从来没人这么做过……”
languages.original_text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."

traits.locale_text: “是维亚特总督在残害我们！这里的每个人都知道她对我们做了什么。我们已经忍了很久了，希望有谁能帮帮我们……但从来没人这么做过……”

languages.text: «¡De la gobernadora Vyatt! Aquí todo el mundo es consciente de lo que nos hace. Llevamos mucho tiempo tragando y tragando, con la esperanza de que alguien le plantara cara y nos ayudara... Pero así seguimos...».
languages.original_text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."

traits.locale_text: «¡De la gobernadora Vyatt! Aquí todo el mundo es consciente de lo que nos hace. Llevamos mucho tiempo tragando y tragando, con la esperanza de que alguien le plantara cara y nos ayudara... Pero así seguimos...».

languages.text: "Vor Gouverneurin Vyatt! Alle hier wissen, was sie uns antut. Wir haben lange ausgehalten, in der Hoffnung, dass sich jemand einmischt und uns hilft ... Aber es ist nie jemand gekommen ..."
languages.original_text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."

traits.locale_text: "Vor Gouverneurin Vyatt! Alle hier wissen, was sie uns antut. Wir haben lange ausgehalten, in der Hoffnung, dass sich jemand einmischt und uns hilft ... Aber es ist nie jemand gekommen ..."

languages.text: « De la gouverneure Vyatt ! Tout le monde ici sait ce qu'elle nous fait subir. On a supporté ça longtemps, en espérant que quelqu'un ferait quelque chose pour nous aider, mais... personne n'est jamais venu. »
languages.original_text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."

traits.locale_text: « De la gouverneure Vyatt ! Tout le monde ici sait ce qu'elle nous fait subir. On a supporté ça longtemps, en espérant que quelqu'un ferait quelque chose pour nous aider, mais... personne n'est jamais venu. »

languages.text: "Vali Vyatt'tan! Onun bize neler yaptığını burada bilmeyen yok. Buna çok uzun zaman boyunca tahammül ettik, birinin müdahale edip bize yardımcı olmasını umduk ama kimse yardımımıza koşmadı."
languages.original_text: "From Governor Vyatt! Everybody here knows what she's doing to us. We've put up with it for a long time, hoping that somebody would intervene and help us... But nobody ever did..."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Vyatt'tan! Onun bize neler yaptığını burada bilmeyen yok. Buna çok uzun zaman boyunca tahammül ettik, birinin müdahale edip bize yardımcı olmasını umduk ama kimse yardımımıza koşmadı."
